    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Car_Controller(Controller_Computer ControllerComputer)
      Needs the Controller_Computer to get access to the log and starts the timer without any delay and a 100ms period.

    • Method Detail

      • UpdateVariables

        public void UpdateVariables(boolean Up,
                   boolean Down,
                   boolean Right,
                   boolean Left)
        The timer needs the current settings of the keys you are pressing. Without variables you won't be able to see what is still pressed or not.
